title: Professional writer who knows how to write collection letters
snippet:
We are looking for a qualified professional who knows how to write collection letters. This candidate must have experience and understand the dynamics of a collection letter. The selected candidate will write one demand letter for Blackline Collections.

There is a one-time payment for this project of $35.

Blackline Collections is a consumer collection agency serving Florida. We collect consumer debt for financial institutions, apartments and utility companies.
